GSP29udnyku1u:8: [ku.1.102] iha yadyapi yaṃ kamapi puruṣārthamarthayamānāḥ- śuddhabuddhasvabhāva ityaupaniṣadāḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:18: sarvatra iti saugatāḥ, nivāraṇa iti digambarāḥ, upāsyatvena deśita (nodita)
GSP29udnyku1u:21: kiṃ bahunā- kāravo 'pi yaṃ viśvakarmeti upāsate,
GSP29udnyku1u:23: ve bhagavati bhave sandeha eva kutaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:27: śruto hi bhagavān bahuśaḥ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣvidānīṃ mantavyo bhavatiḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:31: [ku.1.104] tadiha saṅkṣepataḥ pañcatayī vipratipattiḥ- alaukikasya paralokasādhanasyābhāvāt ;
GSP29udnyku1u:38: [ku.1.106] na hyayaṃ saṃsāraḥ (8) aneka(naika)vidha(vidho)dukhamayo nirapekṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP29udnyku1u:39: tadā hi- syādeva, na syādeva vā- na tu kadācit syāt //
GSP29udnyku1u:40: akasmādeva bhavatīti cenna- hetubhūtiniṣedho na svānupākhyavidhirna ca /
GSP29udnyku1u:44: utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ svayamasataḥ svotpattāvaprabhutvena svasmāditi pakṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:47: anupākhyasya hetutve prāgiti satvaprasaktau punaḥ sadātanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:48: [ku.1.108] syādetat- na akasmāditi kāraṇaniṣedhamātraṃ vā bhavanapratiṣedho vā svātmahetukatvaṃ vā nirupākhyahetukatvaṃ vābhidhitsitam /
GSP29udnyku1u:52: na hyuttarakālasiddhitvamātraṃ kādācitkatm; kiṃ tu prāgasatve sati /
GSP29udnyku1u:53: sāvadhītve tu sa eva prācyo heturityucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:55: anyeṣāmapi tatkāle satvāt anyathā tasyaiva nirūpaṇānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:57: itaranirapekṣasya prāgabhāvasyāvadhitve prāgapi tadavadheḥ(13) kāryasya sattvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:59: na tu te 'pekṣyanta iti svabhāvārtha iti cet-“nāpekṣyanta” iti kor'thaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:67: na hyākāśasya tattvamākasmikamiti sarvasya kiṃ na syāditi vaktumucitam” iti cenna,
GSP29udnyku1u:70_0: nanvevamihāpi sarvadā bhavataḥ kādācitkatvasvabhāvavyāghāta iti tulyaḥ parihāraḥ-
GSP29udnyku1u:70_1: na tulyaḥ- niravadhitve aniyatāvadhitve vā kādācitkatvavyāghātāt niyatāvadhitve hetuvādābhyupagamāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:78: [ku.1.114] prāgabhāvo hyuttarakālāvadhiranādiḥ, evaṃ bhāvo 'pi ghaṭādiḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:79: anupalabhyamānaprākkoṭikaghaṭādiviṣayaṃ nedamaniṣṭamiti cenna- tāvanmātrāvadhisvabhāvatve tadaharvat pūrvedyurapi tamavadhīkṛtya taduttarasya satvaprasaṅgāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:83: tadaharevānena bhavitavyamiti asya svabhāva iti cenna-tasyāpyahnaḥ pūrvanyāyena pūrvamapi satvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:99: kāraṇavyāvṛtyā ca na tajjātīyasyaiva kāryasya vyāvṛttiravasīyeta /
GSP29udnyku1u:101: yāvaddarśanaṃ vyavasthā bhaviṣyatīti cenna, nimittasyādarśanāt, dṛṣṭasya cānimittatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:107: na hi sati bhāvamātraṃ tat; kiṃ tu satyeva bhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:108: na ca jātiniyame samavāyikāraṇamātraṃ nibandhanam, api tu sāmagrī /
GSP29udnyku1u:115: nirmanthanenāraṇereva pratiphalitataraṇikiraṇairmaṇereveti prakāraniyamavat tenaiva vyajyamānasya kāryajātibhedasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:119: yastu taṃ nākalayet, sa kāryasāmānyena kāraṇamātramanuminuyāditi kimanupannam /
GSP29udnyku1u:120: [ku.1.120] evaṃ tarhi dhūmādāvapi kaścidanupalakṣaṇīyo viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29udnyku1u:125: pratyakṣānupalambhagocaro jātibhedo na kāryaprayojaka iti vadato bauddhasya śirasyeṣa prahāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:129: tṛṇādīnāṃ viśeṣa eva niyatatvāditi cet-(25) na /
GSP29udnyku1u:138: yathā- pradīpa eka eva timirāpahārī vartivikārakārī rūpāntaravyavahārakārīti cenna- vaicitryāt kāryasya /
GSP29udnyku1u:139: ekasya na kramaḥ kvāpi vaicitryaṃ ca samasya na /
GSP29udnyku1u:144: ayamapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅge parihāro na tu sahakārivāde /
GSP29udnyku1u:155: na hi svādhīnamasyādahanatvam; api tu tajjanakasvabhāvādhīnam /
GSP29udnyku1u:156: tathā ca tadāyattatvāddahanasyāpi tattvaṃ kena vāraṇīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:157: na hi tasmin janayitavye nāsau tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:162: [ku.1.125] astu dṛṣṭameva sahakāricakram; kimapūrvakalpanayeti cenna- viśvavṛttitaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:167: na hi niṣphale duḥkhaikaphale vā kaścideko 'pi prekṣāpūrvakārī ghaṭeta; prāgeva jagat /
GSP29udnyku1u:169: na hīyaṃ pravṛttiḥ svarūpata eva taddhetuḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:170: yato vānena labdhavyaṃ yovainaṃ pūjayiṣyati, sa kimartham? khyātyarthamanurāgārthaṃ ca /
GSP29udnyku1u:174: traividyatapasvino dhūrtavakāḥ eveti cenna- teṣāṃ dṛṣṭasampadaṃ pratyanupayogāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:175: [ku.1.127] sukhārthaṃ tathā karotīti cenna- nāstikairapi tathā karaṇaprasaṅgāt, sambhogavat /
GSP29udnyku1u:181: te 'pi vṛddhatarairityevamanādiriti cet- na tarhi vipralipsuḥ kaścidatra,
GSP29udnyku1u:183: idaṃ prathama eva kaścidanuṣṭhāyāpi dhūrtaḥ parān anuṣṭhāpayatīti cet- kimasau sarvalokottara eva;
GSP29udnyku1u:184: yaḥ sarvasvadakṣiṇayā sarvabandhuparityāgena sarvasukhavimukho brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā vā kevalaparavañcana(29)
GSP29udnyku1u:188: kena vā cinhenāyamīdṛśastvayā lokottaraprajñena pratāraka iti nirṇītaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:190: (31)yataḥ pākhaṇḍābhimateṣvapyevaṃ dṛśyata iti cenna- hetudarśanādarśanābhyāṃ viśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:191: anādau caivambhūte 'nuṣṭhāne pratāyamāne prakārāntaramāśrityāpi bahuvittavyayāyāsopadeśamātreṇa pratāraṇā syāt; (32)
GSP29udnyku1u:194: [ku.1.129] astu dānādhyayanādireva vicitro heturjagadvaicitryasyeti cenna- kṣaṇikatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:200: yena niyatabhogasādhanānīti cet- tadidamamīṣāmatīndriyaṃ rūpaṃ sahakāribhedo vā?
GSP29udnyku1u:207: tādṛśādeva mantrādipratibandhe sati dāho na jāyate; asati tu jāyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:211: na ca pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭā sāmagrī kāraṇam; abhāvasyākāraṇatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:223: na hi vidhirūpeṇāsau tuccha iti svarūpeṇāpi tathā; niṣedharūpābhāve vidherapi(reva)
GSP29udnyku1u:225: kāraṇatvasya bhāvatvena vyāptatvāttannivṛttau tadapi nivartata iti
GSP29udnyku1u:228: abhāvasyāvarjanīyatayāsannidhiḥ na tu hetutveneti cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:230: bhāvasyābhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpameveti cet- abhāvasyāpi bhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpānnātiricyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:231: tasmāt yathā “bhāvasyaiva bhāvo janaka” iti niyamo 'nupapannaḥ, tathā “bhāva eva janaka” ityapi /
GSP29udnyku1u:233: [ku.1.132] pratibandhakottambhakaprayogakāle tu vyabhicārastadā syāt; yadi yādṛśe sati kāryānudayaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:240: sa cottambhakamantra evetyanyaiva sāmagrīti cet- na,
GSP29udnyku1u:242: na hi daṇḍini sati adaṇḍānāmanyeṣāṃ nābhāvaḥ, kintu daṇḍābhāvasyaiva kevalasyeti yuktam /
GSP29udnyku1u:250: kāryasya tadvyabhicārāt; jātibhedakalpanāyāṃ ca pramāṇābhāvāt; yathoktenaivopapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:251: bhāve vā kāmamasāvastu; kā no hāniḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:259: anupagṛhītānāṃ ca kathaṃ kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇamiti cet- mā bhūjjātiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:266: arthāt asati na jāyate” iti sthite tadbhāve 'pi tajjātīyāntarābhāvānna bhavitavyaṃ kāryeṇeti (36)
GSP29udnyku1u:267: na tathaitadapi; anukūlavat pratikūle 'pi sati tajjātīyāntarābhāvānāmakiñcitkaratvāditi /
GSP29udnyku1u:273: tatprayoktārastu pratibandhāraḥ, te ca kiñcitkarā eveti kimasamañjasam /
GSP29udnyku1u:274: ye tu vyutpādayanti; “kāryānutpāda eva pratibandha” iti- taiḥ (37)
GSP29udnyku1u:276: tathā hi- kāryasyānutpādaḥ prāgabhāvo vā syāt, tasya kālāntaraprāptirvā /
GSP29udnyku1u:280: prāgabhāvāvacchedakakālopādhistadapekṣa iti cenna- mantrātpūrvamapi tasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:293: na ca samānaśaktikatayā tulyajātīyatvānnaivamiti sāmpratam; vijātīyeṣu samānaśaktiniṣedhāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:300: na ca mantrādīneva sahakāriṇaḥ prāpya te kāryakāriṇa iti sāmpratam- teṣu ciradhvasteṣvapi kāryotpādāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:304: teṣāmanantatvādanantaphalapravāhaḥ prasajyata iti cet- apūrvepi kalpite tāvāneva
GSP29udnyku1u:305: phalapravāha iti kutaḥ ? apūrvasvābhāvyāditi cet- tulyamihāpi /
GSP29udnyku1u:309: yathā guruṇā ṭīkā; kuruṇā kṣetram- iti cet- tadasat /
GSP29udnyku1u:310: na hi svarūpavyāpārayorabhāve 'pyupalakṣaṇasya kāraṇatvaṃ kaścidicchati; atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:311: vyavahāramātraṃ tu tajjñānasādhyam, na tu tatsādhyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:314: (astu tāvat) astu vā tatrāpyatiśayakalpanā; kinnaśchinnam ? yadvā yāgāderapyupalakṣaṇatvamastu /
GSP29udnyku1u:315: tadupalakṣitaḥ kālo yajvā vā svargādi sādhayiṣyati kṛtamapūrveṇa /
GSP29udnyku1u:316: [ku.1.139] na ca devadattasya svaguṇākṛṣṭāḥ śarīrādayo bhogāya,
GSP29udnyku1u:319: na ca tadrahitānāmapi bhoga iti yuktimat, yena tato 'pyadhikaṃ siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku1u:321: nāpi kāryatve satīti viśeṣaṇāyo hetuḥ; tathāpyupalakṣaṇaireva siddhasādhanāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:322: asatāṃ teṣāṃ kathamutpādakatvamiti cet- tadetadabhimantraṇādiṣvapi tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:323: [ku.1.140] tasmādbhāvabhūtamatiśayaṃ janayanta eva prokṣaṇādayaḥ kālāntarabhāvine phalāya kalpante /
GSP29udnyku1u:329: yathā hi devatāviśeṣoddeśena hutāśane havirāhutayaḥ samantrāḥ prayuktāḥ puruṣamabhisaṃskurvate,
GSP29udnyku1u:331: nāpi devatāḥ; tathā vrīhyādyuddeśena prayujyamānaḥ prokṣaṇādiḥ puruṣameva saṃskurute, na tam /
GSP29udnyku1u:336: [ku.1.142] na tarhi barhiṣa iva vrīhyādeḥ punarupayogāntaraṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:342: yathācābhicārasaṃskāro yaṃ dehamuddiśya prayuktastadapekṣa eva tatsambaddhasyaiva duḥkhamupajanayati nānyasya;
GSP29udnyku1u:344: evamabhimantraṇādisaṃskārā api bhavanto na manāgapi nopayujyante /
GSP29udnyku1u:345: kathaṃ tarhi vrīhyādīnāṃ saṃskāryakarmateti cet- prokṣaṇādiphalasambandhādeva /
GSP29udnyku1u:346: [ku.1.143] nanu yaduddeśena yatkriyate tattatra kiñcitkaram, yathā putreṣṭipitṛyajñau /
GSP29udnyku1u:347: tathā cābhimantraṇādayo vrīhyādyuddeśena pravṛttāḥ ityanumānamiti cet- tanna- havistyāgādibhiranaikāntikatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:348: na hi te kālāntarabhāviphalānuguṇaṃ kiñcit hutāśanādau janayanti /
GSP29udnyku1u:349: kiṃ vā na dṛṣṭamindriyaliṅgaśabdavyāpārāḥ prameyoddaśena pravṛttāḥ pramātaryeva kiñcijjanayanti, na prameye iti /
GSP29udnyku1u:350: [ku.1.144] kṛṣicikitse apyevameva syātāmiti cenna- dṛṣṭenaiva pākajarūpādi (38)
GSP29udnyku1u:359: gokṣīraṃ mahiṣādeḥ jātyā vyāvartate; tathā tatparamāṇavo 'pi mūlabhūtāḥ pākajaireva vyāvartante /
GSP29udnyku1u:360: na hyasti sambhavo gokṣīraṃ surabhimadhuraṃ śītam; tatparamāṇavaśca viparītāḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:367: tadānīṃ tu vibhaktānāmadṛṣṭādeva (44)kevalānmithaḥ saṃsarga iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:368: na ca vācyamidānīmapi tathaiva kiṃ na syāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:378: tadyathā- hārītamāṃsaṃ haridrājalāvasiktaṃ (46)haridrāgnipluṣṭam upayogāt sadyo vyāpādayati /
GSP29udnyku1u:381: [ku.1.147] yatra tarhi toye tejasi vāyau vā na pākajo viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:383: pārthive pratimādau pratiṣṭhādinā saṃskṛte 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt pūjanādinā dharmo vyatikrame tvadharmaḥ apratiṣṭhite tu na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:390: tathā svabhāvadravā apyāpo nimittabhedapratibaddhadravatvāḥ kaṭhinaṃ karakādyārabhante ityādi svayamūhanīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:393: sannidhānaṃ ca tatra teṣāmahaṅkāramamakārau, citrādāviva svasādṛśyadarśino rājña iti no darśanam /
GSP29udnyku1u:394: anyeṣāṃ tu pūrvapūrvapūjitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya pratiṣṭhitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya ca tathātvamavaseyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:397: kuśalaiveti cenna- na hi sāmagrīdṛṣṭaṃ vighaṭayati; nāpyadṛṣṭam; jñāpakatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:400: viparyaye sarvadā bhaṅgaprasaṅgāt- atrocyate-[ku.1.150] jayetaranimittasya vṛttilābhāya kevalam /
GSP29udnyku1u:403: tāśca karmavibhavānurūpaṃ liṅgamabhivyañjayantī'tyasmākaṃ siddhāntaḥ- tathāpi paravipratipatteranyathocyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:404: tenāpi hi vidhinā tadeva jayasya parājayasya vā nimittamabhivyaktaṃ (49)
GSP29udnyku1u:410: atha vā pratijñānurūpāṃ viśuddhimapekṣya tena dharmo janyate,
GSP29udnyku1u:414: [ku.1.151] atha śaktiniṣedhe kiṃ pramāṇam? na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:416: na hi no darśane śaktipadārtha eva nāsti /
GSP29udnyku1u:426: asmadabhipretasya cābhāvāderanugrāhakatvamaṅgīkṛtya niḥsādhanā mīmāsaṃkā api na vipratipattumarhanti /
GSP29udnyku1u:431: [ku.1.152] tathāpi cetana evāyaṃ saṃskriyate, na bhūtānīti kuto nirṇaya iti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:433: na hi taccharīraṃ tanmanastānīndriyāṇi viśiṣṭānyapi tasyaiveti niyamaḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:436: na ca bhūtadharma eva (53)kañciccetanaṃ pratyasādhāraṇaḥ; viparyayadarśanāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:438: niyatacetanaguṇopagraheṇaiva tasyāpi niyamaḥ, na tu tajjanyatāmātreṇa; svayamaviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:439: [ku.1.153] tathāpi tajjanyatayaiva niyamopapattau vipakṣe bādhakaṃ kimiti ceta- kāryakāraṇabhāvabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:441: tadyathā- icchopagraheṇa prayatnaḥ, jñānopagraheṇecchādayaḥ, tadupagraheṇa sukhādaya ityādi /
GSP29udnyku1u:442: prakṛte 'pi cetanagatā eva buddhyādayo niyāmakāḥ syuriti cenna; śarīrādeḥ prāk teṣāmasattvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:468: sā hi buddhiraṃśatrayavatī; puruṣoparāgo viṣayoparāgo vyāpārāveśaścetyaṃśāḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:470: tatra mayeti cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:471: idamiti viṣayoparāga indriyapraṇāḍikayā pariṇatibhedo darpaṇasyeva niśvāsābhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:474: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātātvikasya sambandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva malinimnā, sopalabdhiriti /
GSP29udnyku1u:476: na ca buddhireva svabhāvataścetaneti yuktam- pariṇāmitvāt; puruṣasya tu kūṭasthānityatvāditi /
GSP29udnyku1u:478: tathā hi- kartṛdharmā niyantāraḥ cetitā ca sa eva naḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:484: tathā ca kṛtirapi (56)(svā)bhāvikī mahato na syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:489: yadyacca kārye rūpaṃ dṛśyate tasya tasya kāraṇātmakatve rāgādayo 'pi prakṛtau svīkartavyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:490: tathā ca saiva buddhiḥ, na prakṛtiḥ; bhāvāṣṭakasampannatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:491: sthūlatāmapahāya sūkṣma(rūpa)tayā te tatra santīti cet caitanyamapi tathā bhaviṣyati /
GSP29udnyku1u:493: tathā sati ghaṭādīnāmapi caitanyaprasaṅgaḥ, tādātmyāditi cet- rāgādimattvaprasaṅgo 'pi durvāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:496: tathā bhūtāttathābhūtamātramanumātavyam; na tu yāvaddharmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāvaddharmakaṃ kāryam,
GSP29udnyku1u:500: atha vilīyate, tato nānādervilaya ityādimattve, tadanutpattidaśāyāṃ ko niyantā?
GSP29udnyku1u:504: saukṣmyānna doṣa iti cet- muktāvapi punaḥpravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:509: yogāttena tena śabdena vyapadiśyate śārīravāyuvaditi āgamo 'pi saṅgacchate ityato 'pi heturasiddhaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:521: sambandhamātraṃ vā bhede eva bhede 'pi cacopapadyamānam,
GSP29udnyku1u:531: vāsanāsaṅkramo nāsti na ca gatyantaraṃ sthire //15 //
GSP29udnyku1u:536: saṃsargādanyavāsanānyatra saṅkrāmati; mātrānubhūtasya garbhasthena bhrūṇena smaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:537: na copādānopādeyabhāvaniyamo gatiḥ; sthirapakṣe paramāṇūnāṃ tadabhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:541: na cātiśayo (60) vyatiricyate; kiṃ tu sādṛśyatiraskṛtatvāt drāgeva na vikalpyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:543: tathā ca bhūtānyeva tathā tathotpadyante, yathā yathā pratisandhānaniyamādayo 'pyupapadyante /
GSP29udnyku1u:546: api ca-[ku.1.161] na vaijātyaṃ vinā tatsyānna tasminnanumā bhavet /
GSP29udnyku1u:547: vinā tena na tatsiddhirnādhyakṣaṃ niścayaṃ vinā //16 //
GSP29udnyku1u:551: tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa iti nyāyāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:555: na tu dṛṣṭajātīyasya” iti śaṅkayā na tadutpattisiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:556: dṛṣṭajātīyamākasmikaṃ syāditi cenna- tatrāpi kiñcidanyadeva prayojakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyaviredhāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:558: nāpi kāryasāmānyasyānyaprayojakaṃ dṛśyate” iti cet- tat kiṃ kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ svagatastatprayojakatayopalabdhaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:559: kāraṇasāmānyasya vānyatprayojyāntaraṃ dṛśyate; yato vivakṣitasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:563: na hi dhūmasya viśeṣaṃ dahanaprayojyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ prabhavati /
GSP29udnyku1u:565: kāryasya cātīndriyasyāpi sambhavāt; ata evānupalabdhyantaramapi niravakāśamiti /
GSP29udnyku1u:566: [ku.1.163] evaṃ vidhirūpayorvyāvṛttirūpayorvā jātyorvirodhe sati na samāveśaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:571: kuta etat? parasparaparihāreṇa sarvadā vyavasthiteriti cet- nedamapyadhyakṣam /
GSP29udnyku1u:574: tatkāryayoḥ parasparaparihṛtisvabhāvatvāditi cettarhi kampaśiṃśapayoḥ parasparaparihāravatyorna samāveśaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:575: dṛśyate tāvadidamiti cet- gotvāśvatvayorapi na dṛkṣyata iti kā pratyāśā?
GSP29udnyku1u:581: evaṃ śākhādimanmātrānubandhī vṛkṣavyavahāraḥ; tadviśeṣānubandhī ca śiṃśapāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:582: sa kathaṃ tamatipatyātmānamāsādayediti- cet- evaṃ tarhi śiṃśapāsāmagryantarbhūtā calanasāmagrī /
GSP29udnyku1u:584: tathā śākhādimadviśeṣānubandhī śiṃśapāvyavahāraḥ, tadviśeṣānubandhī ca calanavyavahāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:587: na tu tadviśeṣamātrādhīnamiti cet- yadi nodanādayaḥ svabhāvabhūtāḥ; tatastadviśeṣā eva /
GSP29udnyku1u:589: tataḥ (tathā ca) tānāsādya nirviśeṣaiva śiṃśapācalanasvabhā(vatvamā)(vān ā)vamārabhata iti /
GSP29udnyku1u:591: [ku.1.166] svabhāvabhūtā evāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādbhavantīti cet- evaṃ tarhi vṛkṣasāmagryāmāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādeva śiṃśapāpi jāyata iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:601: kintvāgantavaḥ[ntuka] sahakāriṇa iti cet- evaṃ tarhi tānāsādya sadṛśarūpā api kecit kampakāriṇaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:603: tathā ca tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa (64) iti syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:607: teṣāṃ tu viruddhānāṃ na samāveśo vyaktibhedāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:609: tathā ca kutaḥ kṣaṇikatm? vaijātyābhyupagame ca kuto 'numānavārtā /
GSP29udnyku1u:610: [ku.1.170] mā bhūdanumānamiti cenna- tena hi vinā (65)na tat siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku1u:611: na hi kṣaṇikatve pratyakṣamasti; tathā niścayābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:616: tato vartamānatvaniścaya eva bhedaniścaya iti cet- kimatra tadabhi[pi] matamāyuṣmataḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:617: yadi dharmyeva nīlādiḥ, na kiñcidanupapannam; tasya sthairyāsthairyasādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:618: atha dharmaḥ “tadbhedaniścaye 'pi dharmiṇaḥ kimāyātam? tasya tato 'nyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:619: vartamānāvartamānatvamekasya viruddhamiti cet- yadi sadasattvaṃ tat” tanna; anabhyupagamāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:622: krameṇānekasambhandha ekasyānupapanna iti cet- astitāvadato nirūpaṇīyam kṣaṇapratyayastu bhrānto 'pi nāstīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:624: mā bhūdadhyakṣa(67)manumānaṃ vā kṣaṇikatve; tathāpi sandeho 'stu /
GSP29udnyku1u:625: etāvatāpi siddhaṃ samīhitaṃ cārvākasyeti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:627: ekatāniścayo yena kṣaṇe, tena sthire mataḥ //17 //
GSP29udnyku1u:628: n.a hi sthire taddarśane vā svarasavāhī sandehaḥ; pratyabhijñānasya durapahnavatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:629: nāpi tatprāmāṇye; sa hi na tāvatsārvatrikaḥ; vyāghātāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:630: tathā hi- prāmāṇyāsiddhau sandeho 'pi na siddhyet; tatsiddhau vā tadapi siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku1u:632: niścayasya tadadhīnatvāt koṭidvayasya cādṛṣṭasyānupasthāne kaḥ sandehārthaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:634: etenāprāmāṇikastadvyavahāra iti nirastam; sarvathā prāmāṇyāsiddhau tasyāpyasiddheḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:636: lūnapunarjātakeśādau vyabhicāradarśanāditi cet- na ekatvaniścayasya tvayāpīṣṭatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:638: siddhyatu, yatra viruddhadharmaviraha iti cet- tenaiva sthiratvamapi niścīyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:639: sa iha sandihyata iti cet- tulyametat /
GSP29udnyku1u:641: [ku.1.174] nanvetat kāraṇatvaṃ yadi svabhāvo bhāvasya, nīlādivat, tadā sarvasādhāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:647: sthirasyaikasvabhāvatvāditi cet- ucyate-[ku.1.175] hetuśaktimanādṛtya nīlādyapi na vastusat /
GSP29udnyku1u:648: tadyuktaṃ tatra tat śaktamiti sādhāraṇaṃ na kim //18 //
GSP29udnyku1u:649: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇ.a kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi pāramārthikamevābhyupagantavyam,
GSP29udnyku1u:651: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati, nityatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:661: tathā hi- anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇatvamavadhāryate, nānvayamātreṇa; atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:664: janito hi tena sa tasya syāt, nityo vā /
GSP29udnyku1u:667: tathāpi copādhireva vyatirekaḥ; na tasya; aviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:669: aviśeṣāttadvata iti cet-) na; sa copādhiścetyato 'nyasya
GSP29udnyku1u:671: bhāve vā sa eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:672: atrocyate-[ku.1.178] pūrvabhāvo hi hetutvaṃ mīyate yena kenacit /
GSP29udnyku1u:674: bhavedeva.m, yadyanvayavyatirekāveva kāraṇatvam; kiṃ tu kāryānniyataḥ pūrvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:676: anyathā kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ kvāpi na syāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:681: anyatra tathā darśanāditi cenna- bādhena saṅkocāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:685: sarvavyāpakānāṃ sarvān pratyanvayamātraviśeṣe kāraṇatvaprasaṅgo bādhakamiti cenna- anvayavyatirekavajjātīyatayā vipakṣe bādhakena ca viśeṣe 'natiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:686: tathā hi- kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇavad dṛṣṭamityadṛṣṭāśrayamapi tajjātīyakāraṇakam- āśrayābhāve kiṃ pratyāsannam asamavāyikāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:688: tathā cānutpattiḥ satatotpattirvā sarvatrotpattirvā syāt evamapi nimittasya sāmarthyādeva niyatadeśotpāde sa eva deśo 'vaśyāpekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:689: tathā ca sāmānyato deśasiddhau itarapṛthivyādibādhe tadatiriktasiddhiṃ ko vārayet /
GSP29udnyku1u:691: [ku.1.180] ityeṣā sahakāriśaktirasamā māyā durunnītitaḥ mūlatvātprakṛtiḥ prabodhabhayato 'vidyeti yasyoditā /
GSP29udnyku1u:692: devo 'sau virataprapañcaracanākallolakolāhalaḥ sākṣātsākṣitayā manasyabhiratiṃ badhnātu śānto mama //20 //
